item.title: New Deadlines, New Letters — Same Tariff Uncertainty
item.description: The Trump administration is keen to strike deals as it dangles an extension to trading partners. But it’s also issuing threats to some of them.

item.title: Supreme Court Insists on Reams of Paper for Case Briefs in Digital Age

item.title: The Ruthless Ambition of Stephen Miller
item.description: The most powerful man in the West Wing is getting what he wants. Is Trump?

item.title: Where Do Israel-Hamas Cease-Fire Negotiations Stand?
item.description: Hamas wants to ensure that a new cease-fire includes a guarantee that negotiations will lead to a permanent end to the Gaza war.
